title: Odisha : NFA third Odisha club to compete in upcoming IWL | Bhubaneswar News
body_text:
- News
- City News
- bhubaneswar News
- NFA third Odisha club to compete in upcoming IWL
Trending
This story is from May 31, 2024
NFA achieved the feat by finishing as runners-up in the inaugural edition of the IWL-2 — the second tier womens football league — which concluded with the final round at Mapusa-based Duler Stadium in Goa on Tuesday.
NFA started their campaign with a 1-3 loss to Kolkata-based Sreebhumi FC earlier on May 10. The resurgent Odisha team, however, bounced back into the title race by winning three of their last four matches and drawing one. They capped the final round by trouncing SAG Football Academy 8-1 in their fifth and last match. Sikha Mallik spearheaded the NFA attack with four goals and a total of seven in the final round.
